hypothesis_content.title: Memecoin Volatility Compression Breakout with BTC Regime Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes where BTC 10-day realized volatility drops below 40% and memecoin basket (DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP) 10-day volatility compresses to < 60%, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper bound on increasing volume (>1.5x 20-day avg) signals a momentum expansion phase with 3-day forward returns exceeding 15%.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression in highly speculative assets during neutral BTC regimes often precedes explosive moves when capital rotates back into risk. Breakout with volume confirms institutional or large retail participation.
entry_conditions: Memecoin basket (equal weight DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP) 10-day vol < 60%
Any memecoin closes above 20-day BB upper band
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-day average volume
BTC regime shifts from NEUTRAL to BULL within same session

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Return to below BB midline (20-day SMA)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout success rate < 50% or average 3-day forward return < 8% after 20 instances.
